document.masterDocTitle: Revision of the Agrilus purpurifrons species-group (Coleoptera, Buprestidae, Agrilinae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of the Agrilus purpurifrons species-group (Coleoptera, Buprestidae, Agrilinae)

bibRefCitation.author: Baudon, A.
bibRefCitation.refString: Baudon, A. (1968) Catalogue commente des Buprestidae recoltes au Laos. Deuxieme Partie. Ministere de l'Information, Vientiane, 190 pp.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Agrilus rousselatae
Baudon, 1968
. Described from 1 specimen ( Holotype ). Type locality: “ Laos : Sayaboury”.
Type specimens:
Holotype sex not examined ( MHNB ): “Sayaboury
20.v.
[19]64 [h] Laos (Baudon) [p] \ Type [p] [red label] \ Agrilus rousselatae mihi Type [h] A. Baudon det. [p] [blue label]”.

Examined specimens.
LAOS .
Bolikhamxai .
70 km NEE Vientiane
; 18°16'N , 103°11'E ; 4-1997; alt.
150 m
; 1 ♀ ( EJCB )
.
Houaphan .
Ban Saleuy , Phou Pane Mt. ; 20°12'30”N , 104°00'E ; 6-2011; alt.
1340–1870 m
; 2 ♀ ( EJCB )
.
Phôngsali .
Phongsaly env.; 21°41'30”N , 102°07'E ; 5, 6-2003; alt.
1500 m
; 2 ♂ , 1 ♀ ( EJCB )

1500 m
; 7 ( EJCB )
\\ Phongsaly env.; 21°41'30”N , 102°07'E ; 5-2004; alt.
1500 m
; 7 ( EJCB )

1500 m
; 1 ♂ ( EJCB )
.

6 km SW Thanh Son
; 21°10'50”N , 106°43'26”E ; 5-2015; alt.

].

Tam Dao ; 21°28'N , 105°38'E ; 6-1986; alt.

\\

80 km NW Hanoi
; 21°34'N , 105°20'E ; 1996; alt.
1000 m
; 1 ♂ ( EJCB )
\\
75 km NW of Hanoi
, Tam Dao ; 21°27'N , 105°39'E ; 6-1996; 1 ♂ , 2 ♀ ( EJCB )
\\ Tam Dao ; 21°27'N , 105°39'E ; 5-1997; 8 ( EJCB )
\\ Tam-Dao National Park , Tam-Dao env.; 21°27'38”N , 105°38'28”E ; 6-2011; alt.
900–1200 m
; 6 ♀ ( EJCB )
.
Distribution. LAOS : Bolikhamxai , Houaphan , Phôngsali , Xaignabouli . VIETNAM : Bac Giang , Gia Lai , Vinh Phuc .

Remarks . The specific name
rousselatae Baudon, 1968
is revalidated because the name
lacroixi Obenberger, 1936
belongs to synonymy of
A. morio
.

The record of
A. morio
under synonymic name
A. lacroixi
from Vietnam ( Bac Giang province ) published by Jendek & Nakládal 2019 is a misidentification of
A. rousselatae Baudon, 1968
. Therefore Bac Giang is removed from the range of
A. morio
and added to that of
A. rousselatae
.
